sentences.sentence: Estate sets the right of allusion to be building droit.
sentences.translation: 房地产设典的权利为房屋所有权。

sentences.sentence: The droit of patent application as an inpawningobject is legal and doable.
sentences.translation: 专利申请权作为质押标的是合乎法理并且是可行的。

sentences.sentence: The large building of the Rue Droit-Mur, which had a wing on the Rue Petit-Picpus, turned two facades, at right angles, towards this garden.
sentences.translation: 那栋一面临直壁街一面临比克·布斯小街的大楼房在朝园子的一面，有两个交成曲尺形的正面。
